message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about we meet closer to the middle?
I see you're willing to meet closer to the middle. How about we try 57-43?
This is getting us nowhere. I'm offering a deal very close to your offer, let's be reasonable and end this.
I see you're getting desperate. My offer hasn't changed much, but the value of the money has. You're losing more than me.
Okay, Alice, I see what you're doing. Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day before we both lose out more.
